replies.bodyText: sql.h is in thirdparty/installed/included, so it should be "sql.h"
replies.author: morningman

replies.bodyText:
I think only Doris own code use "", for third-party code use <>.
Glog, protobuf are all in the thirdparty, however we inlcude them with ""

replies.bodyText:
Oh, I misunderstood.
yes, it should be <>.
